Title: The Bug That Ruined Game Physics For Decades
Description:
‚ù§Ô∏è Check out Lambda here and sign up for their GPU Cloud: https://lambda.ai/papers

https://lambda.ai/inference-models/deepseek-r1

üìù The paper "A Stream Function Solver for Liquid Simulations" is available here:
https://pub.ista.ac.at/group_wojtan/projects/2015_Ando_ASFSfLS/download/vecpotential.pdf
